StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int ) AS
SELECT c.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,c.[MARITAL_STATUS_CODE] ,c.[RACE_CODE] ,c.[ETHNIC_CODE] ,c.[GENDER_CODE] ,c.[RELIGION_CODE] ,c.[POPULATION_GROUP_CODE] ,c.[DATE_OF_BIRTH] ,c.[CITIZENSHIP] ,c.[COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN] ,c.[BIRTH_CITY] ,c.[BIRTH_COUNTY] ,c.[BIRTH_STATE] ,c.[DRIVER_LICENSE_STATE] ,c.[DRIVER_LICENSE_NUM] ,c.[DRIVER_LICENSE_EXP] ,c.[MEPCOM_RACE_CODE] ,c.[MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CODE] ,c.[BestTimeToContact] ,c.Needs ,p.[PERSON_ID] ,p.[SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER] ,p.[FIRST_NAME] ,p.[LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME] ,p.[LAST_NAME] ,p.[SUFFIX_CD] ,p.[rowguid] ,p.[DOD_ID] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] c WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[PERSON] p ON c.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = p.[PERSON_ID] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID
